pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, March 10, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chairman of the Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Željko Komšić.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
